title: logitr
description: An R package for estimating multinomial (MNL) and mixed logit (MXL) models in R with "Preference" space or "Willingness-to-pay" (WTP) space utility parameterizations.

title: cbcTools
description: An R package with tools for designing choice based conjoint (cbc) survey experiments and conducting power analyses.

title: Wireless Corne
description: A build log and gallery of how I built my wireless Corne keyboard.

title: The Distillery
description: A distill website showcasing other distill websites and blogs.

title: renderthis
description: An R package for rendering slides and other media into different formats, including html, pdf, png, gif, pptx, and mp4.

title: charts
description: A bunch of reproducible charts. All data and source code are available at https://github.com/jhelvy/charts

title: GW Coders
description: A study group that brings together students and faculty to apply computational and data analytics skills in research.

title: splitKbCompare
description: An interactive R Shiny app for comparing layouts of different split mechanical keyboards. Built for the ergonomic keyboard community r/ErgoMechKeyboards.

title: λέξις (lexis)
description: A theme for xaringan slides with a light gray background, "Fira Sans Condensed" for headers, "Inter" for body text, and "SFMono-Regular" for mono text.

title: EMSE 4571: Intro to Programming for Analytics
description: A course on the fundamentals of programming and computational thinking in R.

title: EMSE 4572: Exploratory Data Analysis
description: A course on the foundations in exploring and visualizing data in R.

title: EMSE 6035: Marketing Analytics for Design Decisions
description: A course on analyzing consumer choice data in R to inform design decisions in an uncertain, competitive, market.

title: formr4conjoint
description: A template for how to create a choice-based conjoint survey using the formr survey platform.

title: R for Analytics Primer
description: A self-guided tutorial for developing a foundation in programming in R for data analysis, including data input/output, data wrangling, and data visualization using the Tidyverse.

title: Iris Rev 2
description: A build log and gallery of how I built my Iris Rev 2 keyboard.
